title: Fantasy Esports Looking for Mid main
body:
Fantasy Esports is growing and we are currently looking for a committed mid laner. Looking at Diamond 5 and up. the members are all diamond 5 and up. We are a team that is looking to go pro on the Oceanic server. We have a analyst who is working with us. All i ask is that you be professional. 

Add me in game and we can talk there.

You need Jesus - manager of Fantasy Esports.
